name: Weapon Rifle Morphing Simulator
description:
Weapon Rifle Morphing Simulator
Morph Weapon Rifle Simulator - a game simulator joke where you can try yourself in the role of engineer weapons rifles!
Try using our game to imagine how we could look like different weapons in the parallel world!
Be smart and fantasy! Make the most fantastic and not the usual weapons, rifles and pistols!
Unlock all kinds of rifles!
Collect a complete collection of items!
Symbiosis guns can be very not the usual! rifle and a pistol, machine gun and sniper rifle!
ATTENTION! The game is made for fun and jokes!
Leave us your feedback and evaluation, we really appreciate your feedback to make the game even better!
